snippet: A late-season game between the Islanders and the Rangers in which both teams’ playoff chances are on the line has only happened four other times in the 40-season history of the rivalry.
abstract: Rival New York Islanders and New York Rangers prepare for late-season matchup in which both teams' playoff chances are at stake; scenario has only happened four other times in 40-season history of rivalry.
lead_paragraph: A late-season game between the Islanders and the Rangers in which both teams’ playoff chances are on the line has only happened four other times in the 40-season history of the rivalry.

headline.seo: Rangers and Islanders, With Playoffs at Stake
headline.main: A Rarity for Rangers and Islanders, With Playoff Berths at Stake
headline.print_headline: Rangers and Islanders, With Playoff Berths at Stake
